definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
Fujian province (Fukien) in east China, abbr. 福 or 閩|闽, capital Fuzhou 福州/Fujian province (Fukien) in Taiwan
Fuzhou prefecture-level city and capital of Fujian province in east China/formerly known as Foochow or Fuchow
Fujian province (Fukien) in east China, abbr. 閩|闽, capital Fuzhou 福州/Fujian province (Fukien) in Taiwan
Futian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong/Fukuda (Japanese surname)
field for growing happiness/domain for practices leading to enlightenment (Buddhism)
Futian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong/Fukuda (Japanese surname)
field for growing happiness/domain for practices leading to enlightenment (Buddhism)
Fuzhou prefecture-level city and capital of Fujian province in east China/formerly known as Foochow or Fuchow

sentences.english: Fulgrim of the Emperor's Children was the closest to horus.
sentences.chinese: 帝皇之子的福爾格里姆是最親近何魯斯的人。

sentences.english: The best preserved temple of Egyptian antiquity in Edfu.
sentences.chinese: 埃德福神廟是埃及至今保存最完好的神廟。

sentences.english: Whoever invokes a blessing in the land will do so by the God of truth;
sentences.chinese: 這樣，在地上爲自己求福的，必憑真實的神求福。

sentences.english: By the way, I'm in Branford College, which is of long history.
sentences.chinese: 對了，我住在布蘭福學院，它可是有着悠久的歷史哦。

sentences.english: Blessed are those who are forgiven their sins by God.
sentences.chinese: 蒙神赦罪的人是有福的。

sentences.english: But while the snub shape may be attractive, it is not necessary a blessing.
sentences.chinese: 儘管翹鼻子可能有魅力，但這未必是福。

sentences.english: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 虛心的人有福了，因爲天國是他們的。

sentences.english: The Bhattis' would continue to be the blessed family.
sentences.chinese: 巴蒂家是個有福的家族。

sentences.english: Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for God's righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 飢渴愛慕神公義的人有福了。

sentences.english: One holiday afternoon his cousin Fred came to pay him a visit.
sentences.chinese: 一個假日的下午，他的堂哥福瑞德拜訪他。

sentences.english: Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for uprightness.
sentences.chinese: 飢渴慕義的人是有福的。

sentences.english: The tray in the centre will hold the HARMAN SELENIUM TONER.
sentences.chinese: 放在中間的顯影盤倒入伊爾福硒調色液。

sentences.english: She was hostess also to Clifford's occasional aristocratic relations.
sentences.chinese: 她也款待着克利福的不常來的貴族親戚們。

sentences.english: That he who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth;
sentences.chinese: 這樣，在地上爲自己求福的，必憑真實的神求福。

sentences.english: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin.
sentences.chinese: 主不算爲有罪的，這人是有福的。

definition: to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
